long_notes: Hi everyone! Today the new Grok Imagine image editing and video generation capabilities have come to Grok AI Nano! You can now attach images in imageGen mode to have Grok edit them, and you can create 5-second videos from text prompts and images! One thing to note is that Nano no longer supports grok-2-image for imageGen mode. I hope you all enjoy this update as much as I have enjoyed creating it!
